title: Bandwidth: PlayStation Plus debuts new subscription service, GeForce Now gets Chromebook app
content:
This week marks the introduction to PlayStation’s newest subscription service meant to take on Xbox Game Pass’ overall success. To add, Amazon Luna is finally adding the first round of game additions to its offering list, plus dishing out some free ones for Prime users.

more…

The post Bandwidth: PlayStation Plus debuts new subscription service, GeForce Now gets Chromebook app appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: This week marks the release of PlayStation Plus' new pricing scheme, as well as Amazon Luna's first game release since out of beta.
